title: Trellis System Failed! She Shares Her Mistake. #gardeningtips  #garden #gardeningadvice

tasks.task: Examine and maintain pole structures in a farm system
subtasks: Determine necessity for redoing pole work
Assess current functionality of the pole system
Procure necessary materials for replacement poles
Measure and mark new pole positions
Reinforce and stabilize new pole installations
Check the realignment and pulling effect of new poles
